definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Ideally, every key value in the index is unique.
sentences.chinese: 理想情況是，索引中的每個鍵值都是惟一的。

sentences.english: The one time it is acceptable to swallow an interrupt is when you know the thread is about to exit.
sentences.chinese: 惟一可以生吞中斷的時候是您知道線程正要退出。

sentences.english: China is not the only emerging financier playing a major role in Africa.?
sentences.chinese: 中國不僅是在非洲發揮重要作用的惟一的新興融資方。

sentences.english: Every post will have a random string as the unique key.
sentences.chinese: 每一個帖子將使用一個隨機字符串作爲惟一鍵。

sentences.english: Each extension point is unique and defines a contract to be adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 每個擴展點都是惟一的並且定義需要遵守的契約。

sentences.english: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.
sentences.chinese: 愛是惟一能把知人轉變爲朋友的力量。

sentences.english: Each test method has its own unique TDT.
sentences.chinese: 每個測試方法都有其惟一的TDT。

sentences.english: The only way to round out your education is by going deep into the realities of life.
sentences.chinese: 使你所受教育更加完善的惟一方法是深入生活實際。

sentences.english: This hero is upholds justly, subdues the unprincipled person is his only objective.
sentences.chinese: 這位英雄是主持正義的，制伏壞人是他的惟一宗旨。

sentences.english: All I need to do is lie down,and I can pop right off.
sentences.chinese: 我惟一的需要就是躺下來，我馬上可以入睡。

sentences.english: Amber is the one , true world.
sentences.chinese: 安伯是惟一真實的世界。

sentences.english: The only proviso is that the bytecode modifications should be deterministic and predictable.
sentences.chinese: 惟一的要求是字節碼修改應該是確定性的且可預測的。

sentences.english: The only solution is to encode data to a safe set of characters.
sentences.chinese: 惟一可行的解決方案是將數據編碼爲一組安全的字符。

sentences.english: Radio broadcasting is the only non-visual medium in the world.
sentences.chinese: 廣播是當今世界上惟一的非視覺傳媒。

sentences.english: This is theonly thing that we can do now.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們現在惟一能做的事情。

sentences.english: Pugh is the only person to have completed a long distance swim in each of the five oceans of the world.
sentences.chinese: 普是全球惟一一位在五大洋中完成長距離游泳的人。

definition: one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
one and only (idiom); rarely seen/unique of its kind
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/just a handful/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
